args.justification: All relations in this chunk represent the same taxonomic subtype/supertype hierarchy between nonverbal behavior concepts. Five of six already use the class label 'hierarchical_taxonomy_relation', while this one uses the slightly different and redundant variant 'hierarchical_category_relation'. Normalizing to 'hierarchical_taxonomy_relation' ensures consistent schema for the same semantic family of is_subtype_of relations.
